basics.name: Evan Louie
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Evan is an experienced software developer with 4+ years of industry experience.  He will be earning his degree in April 2015 with a B.Sc Major Computer Science.  Starting out as a junior developer and general IT guy during his high-school years at Oxford Foods in Victoria, B.C., he would later go onto study Computer Science at UBC in 2009 and continue with freelance work while completing his degree. Accepting a 2 year long contract with SAP in 2012, Evan joined a DevOps team as a full-stack developer; developing tools for the auditing of requests for integration of third-party open-source into SAP outbound products.

work.summary: Full-stack developer and open source legal analyst on team dealing with the approval of usage of third-party open-source.
highlights: Developer of internal portal to track and automate team tasks and assignments; implemented with Ruby/Rails/PostgreSQL and integrated with existing J2EE/Hibernate systems.
Developer of open-source vulnerability database, implemented with PHP/Laravel/PostgreSQL and integrated with existing J2EE/Hibernate systems.
Created general purposed Bash/Python scripts for automated server tasks
Audited third party open-source licenses to assure compliance with SAP commercial usage

work.summary: Backend developer of custom BI tools and system administrator
highlights: Developed back-end inventory system which tracks stock inventory and purchasing trends; implemented with Java/Spring

work.summary: Software professional for contract based clientele requesting anything from personal websites to Linux kernel customizations
highlights: SEO Optimization and Google Analytics deployment
Personal site/blog creation or updates; usually deployed using WordPress or Ruby on Rails
